S02grahmdhu:4_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān aḍakavatyāṃ mahānagaryām anekadevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāpasmārādityasomāṅgārabudhabṛhaspatiśukraśaniścararāhuketvādibhiś
S02grahmdhu:6: tadyathā - vajrapāṇinā ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S02grahmdhu:27: evaṃ pramukhair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S02grahmdhu:28: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ (Gmdh 172)
S02grahmdhu:29: suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaparyavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S02grahmdhu:31_0: atha khalu vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokyāsanād utthāya
S02grahmdhu:31_1: svaṛddhyādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya purato
S02grahmdhu:31_2: niṣadya sagarveṇa paryaṅkam ābhujya līlayā tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokya vajrāñjalī
S02grahmdhu:32: grahāś ca bhagavann ugrānugrarūpāś ca raudrāraudrarūpās ca krūrākrūrarūpāś ca sattvān viheṭhayanti /
S02grahmdhu:33: keṣāñcit prāṇam apaharanti keṣāñcid upadravāś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid ojohārāṃś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid dravyam apaharanti keṣāñcid dīrghāyuṣsattvānām alpāyuṣaṃ kurvanti /
S02grahmdhu:35: tad deśayatu bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ yena sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravebhyo rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
S02grahmdhu:36: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe yas tvaṃ sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpācittam utpādya mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛcchasi /
S02grahmdhu:37: tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
S02grahmdhu:38: grahāṇām ugrarūpāṇāṃ krūrātibhīṣaṇamukhānāṃ mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ divyapūjām arghaṃ ca jāpañ ca dhūpañ ca -
S02grahmdhu:41: devāś cāpy asurāś caiva kinnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
S02grahmdhu:42: yakṣāś ca rākṣasāś caiva manuṣāś caivāmānuṣāḥ // 2 //
S02grahmdhu:43: śamayanti ca kruddhāś ca mahānugrāś ca tejasā /
S02grahmdhu:44: pūjāṃ teṣāṃ pravakṣāmi mantrāṃś cāpi yathākramam* // 3 //
S02grahmdhu:45: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svahṛdayāt karuṇāvikrīḍitaṃ nāma raśmijvālaṃ niścārya grahāṇāṃ mūrdhni praveśayati sma /
S02grahmdhu:46_0: atha tatkṣaṇād eva te sarve ādityādayo grahā utthāya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam
S02grahmdhu:46_1: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sarvābhir divyapūjābhiḥ pūjayitvā praṇamya jānubhir nipatya
S02grahmdhu:48: anugṛhītā vayaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhato samyaksaṃbuddhena tad deśayatu bhagavan tādṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vayaṃ sāmagrībhūtasya dharmabhāṇakasya rakṣāṃ kuryāmaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:49: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhanaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuryāmaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:50: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho grahāṇāṃ mantrapūjāñ ca bhāṣate sma /
S02grahmdhu:60: yathānukramabhedena diśāś copadiśāś ca gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ padmamadhye dvādaśāṅgulapramāṇaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇaśobhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ cakrasamanvitaṃ kartavyam* /
S02grahmdhu:61: tanmadhye sitakamalopari kuṅkumagandhamaṇḍalake cintayed devaṃ bhāskaraṃ tāpasarūpadharaṃ bhujābhyāṃ sitakamaladharaṃ raktavarṇaṃ sahasrasūryakoṭisamatejomālinaṃ vigraham* /
S02grahmdhu:64: pūrvasyāṃ diśi raktakamalopari priyaṅgugandhamaṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaṃ sitavarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭapuṣpāvasaktaṃ bhojanaghṛtodanaṃ śrīvāsadhūpaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:67_0: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuklakamalopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake bhikṣurūpo maṅgalo raktavarṇo
S02grahmdhu:67_1: ratnamakuṭo vāme śakti dakṣiṇe varadahasto bhojanam asya kṣīrabhojanaṃ bhāṣabhaktaṃ vā gugguladhūpaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:70: paścimāyām diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāgarugandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budhaḥ syāt pītavarṇo raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:75: uttarasyāṃ diśi sitakamalopari devadārugandhamaṇḍalake parivrājako gurus taptakāñcanavarṇābho raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:79: āgneyāṃ diśi raktapadmopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake śukrapāśupatadhāri gokṣīravarṇadhavalāmbho jaṭāmukutākṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:81: oṃ namaḥ śukrādhipataye asurottamāya śuddhavigrahe svāhā /
S02grahmdhu:82: nairṛtyāṃ diśi sitapaṅkajopari nīlacandanagandhamaṇḍalake śaniścaro kṛṣṇavarṇaphaṇabhṛtkṣapaṇako jñeyaḥ bījajaṭāmukuṭaśmaśruḥ /
S02grahmdhu:87_0: vāyavyāṃ diśi raktāmbhojopari tagarādigandhamaṇḍalake kāpāliko rāhu rājāvartanibho
S02grahmdhu:88: asya deyaṃ bhāṣāmiṣabhojanaṃ tilakṛṣaro vā vilvapatradhūpaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:91: aiśānyāṃ diśi raktasaroruhopari spṛkkāgandhamaṇḍalake cāṇḍālaketur bhavet* /
S02grahmdhu:93: asya deyaṃ bhojanaṃ dhṛtapūrakaṃ sajjaraso dhūpaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:95: maṇḍalasya pūrvadvāre buddho bhagavān dakṣiṇadvāre vajrapāṇiḥ paścimadvāre lokanāthaḥ uttaradvāre mañjuśrīkumāraḥ /
S02grahmdhu:96: pūrvottarakoṇe sarve grahāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇakoṇe sarve rāśinakṣatrāḥ dakṣiṇapaścimakoṇe sarvopadravāḥ paścimottarakoṇe bhaṭṭārikā mahāvidyā /
S02grahmdhu:97: śvetā nīlāruṇatrimukhā hastadvayena vyākhyānamudrā dakṣiṇe ratnachatrā vāme pāśaśaktidharā ratnamukuṭīvajraparyaṅkopaviṣṭā candāsanasamāsīnā ṣoḍaśavarṣākārā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā /
S02grahmdhu:98: bāhyapūrvadvāre dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dadhibhaktaṃ dakṣiṇe virūḍhakasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ paścime virūpākṣasya kṣīrabhatam uttare kuberasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ sindūramastakam* /
S02grahmdhu:101: dhṛtamadhubhyāṃ śaṃkhaṃ pūrayitvā pañcaratnaṃ prakṣipyārgho deyaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:105: oṃ namaḥ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūrakebhyaḥ sarvathā bhaktine svāhā /
S02grahmdhu:106: ratnatrayasya mantraṃ evaṃ pratyekaṃ japet saptasaptāṣṭaśataṃ mantram ekaikaśaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:107: evaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve grahā vividharūpiṇo dadati vipulān bhogān saubhāgyān* janayanty api /
S02grahmdhu:108_0: imāni vajrapāṇe navagrahāṇāṃ hṛdayāni paṭhitasiddhāni tathānukramabhedena gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ
S02grahmdhu:108_1: kṛtvā dvādaśāṅgulimadhye pūjayitavyāni tāmramṛṇmayarūpyādibhojanena arghaṃ datvāṣṭottaraśatavārān
S02grahmdhu:109: paścāt punar vajrapāṇe gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni saptavārānuccārayitavyāni /
S02grahmdhu:111: dāridryaṃ duḥkhaṃ mocayiṣyanti gatāyuṣaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ kariṣyanti /
S02grahmdhu:112: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikān ye vā sattvajātīyā yeṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdaṃ nipatiṣyanti na teṣām akālamṛtyunā kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
S02grahmdhu:113: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe grahān maṇḍalamadhye pūjayitvā dine dine saptavārānuccārayiṣyanti / tatra
S02grahmdhu:114: tasya dharmabhāṇakasya sarve grahāḥ sarveṇa sarvāśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
S02grahmdhu:116: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuni tathāgataḥ punar api gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /
S02grahmdhu:128_0: oṃ buddhe 2 śuddhe 2 vajre 2 padme 2 sara 2 prasare 2 smara 2 krīḍa 2 krīḍaya 2 mara
S02grahmdhu:128_1: 2 māraya 2 mardaya 2 stambha 2 stambhaya 2 ghaṭa 2 ghāṭaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ
S02grahmdhu:128_2: ca vighnān* chinda chinda bhinda 2 sarvavighnān nāśanaṃ kuru 2 mama saparivārasya
S02grahmdhu:128_3: sarvasattvānāñ ca kāryaṃ kṣepaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvanakṣatragrahapīḍān
S02grahmdhu:128_4: nivāraya 2 bhagavati śriyaṃ kuru mahāmāyā prasādhaya sarvaduṣṭān nāśaya sarvapāpāni
S02grahmdhu:128_5: mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāñ ca rakṣa 2 vajre 2 caṇḍe 2 caṇḍini 2 nuru 2 musu
S02grahmdhu:128_6: 2 mumu 2 muñca 2 havā have ugre ugratare pūraya bhagavati manorathaṃ mama sarvaparivārasya
S02grahmdhu:152: imāni vajrapāṇe grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni sarvasiddhikarāṇi ca /
S02grahmdhu:153_0: yac ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe imāni grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni kārtikamāsaśuklapakṣasya
S02grahmdhu:153_1: saptamīm ārabhyopoṣadhiko bhūtvā yāvac caturdaśīgrahanakṣatrān madhye pūjayitvā dine
S02grahmdhu:159: atha te sarve grahāḥ sādhu bhagavann iti kṛtvā praṇamyāntarhitābhūvann iti /
S02grahmdhu:160: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatīparṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
